alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Gonzales; Lavaca (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 19 at 10:35AM CST by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Gonzales, southwestern Fayette and northwestern Lavaca Counties through 1115 AM CST... At 1035 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Waelder, or near Moulton, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... La Grange, Schulenburg, Flatonia, Moulton, Waelder, Cistern, Muldoon, Swiss Alp, Freyburg, Dubina, High Hill, Newtonville, Elm Grove, Engle, O`Quinn, Nickle, Floy, Plum, Ammannsville and Colony. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
